D1.title: Does DEI Staff Size Predict Twitter Bias?
points: Correlation r = -0.13 between DEI staff count and Twitter liberal bias
139 of 152 schools with DEI data lean liberal on Twitter
Schools with 20+ DEI staff are exclusively in the liberal range

D2.title: Do Progressive Schools Have Larger DEI Offices?
points: Full Progressive schools average 7.6 DEI staff
Full Traditional schools average 4.8 DEI staff
Clear gradient: more progressive quadrant = more DEI staff

D3.title: Do Elite Schools Have Bigger DEI Offices?
points: Correlation r = 0.03 between rank and DEI staff
DEI staffing shows wide variance at every rank tier
Some lower-ranked schools have among the largest DEI offices

D4.title: Does DEI Staffing Track Employee Donation Patterns?
points: Correlation r = 0.18 between Dem donation % and DEI staff count
Nearly all schools with large DEI offices donate >80% Democratic
FEC data provides independent financial validation of DEI commitment

D5.title: Does Having a DEI Office Page Signal Liberal Bias?
points: Schools with DEI pages average -18.5 bias vs -13.0 without
Gap of 5.4 points — DEI schools lean more liberal
105 schools have discoverable DEI pages, 47 do not
